trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGNOR4LIMBETH_00718_LIMBETH_000_000<tab>My apologies, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, but I am only permitted to conduct business with a select list of clientele registered with the Boutique of Splendors.

TEXT_REGNOR4LIMBETH_00718_LIMBETH_000_001<tab>Welcome, my <var 08 E905 ((dear lady)) ((good sir)) /var>. Here at the Resplendent Tool Exchange, we offer the finest selection of tools available for the ever-discerning artisan. How may I be of service?
TEXT_REGNOR4LIMBETH_00718_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>In order to obtain a resplendent tool, you must first use crafters' scrips to purchase resplendent material A from the material exchange.

TEXT_REGNOR4LIMBETH_00718_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>Using 8th-level master recipes, this material can then be used to craft resplendent component A, which can be exchanged with Limbeth for a higher-grade material, resplendent material B.

TEXT_REGNOR4LIMBETH_00718_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>The process is then repeated, crafting resplendent component B to exchange for resplendent material C. This material is then crafted into resplendent component C, which can be traded for the final resplendent material.
TEXT_REGNOR4LIMBETH_00718_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>After acquiring a sufficient number of the final resplendent materials, they can be traded for a resplendent tool.
